name: A Wish
description:
This story based game is about a Teddy bear who is in need of your help to escape it's bitter end. This game has 2 Endings 1 alternative and 1 true ending. 

Collect 3 items without Mommy noticing you! If you hear footsteps hide under the bed and use the items to help the Teddy! 

Be careful don't get caught!
